name: Titanium.UI.Windows.ListViewScrollPosition
summary: A set of constants for the position value that can be used for the position property of ListViewAnimationProperties when invoking the ListView's scrollToItem, appendSection, deleteSectionAt, insertSectionAt and replaceSectionAt methods.

deprecated.notes: As of Titanium 9.0.0, building Windows apps is no longer supported.

constants.name: NONE
constants.summary: The list view scrolls to the nearest edge of the row.

constants.name: TOP
constants.summary: The list view scrolls to the leading edge of the row.
